channel.title: Music – The Wallstones
channel.description: Recent content in The Wallstones on Music

item.title: The Wallstones - Hang On
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사:
KY: 61951 / KY: 21386

Fragile
like a single
One feather
silently flying
Wailed the wings
are holding you
Lost into the arms
of the weather
Going wherever
when you think you
Think you
had enough
Pleasure and pain
in your life
Hang on
try to look above
You’re in for
the ride of your life
Hang on and
when times get ruff
You will make it
try to hold on
When you think you
had enough
Feels like you are
lost on the water
You’re going deeper
and there’s no one
Saving you
try to make it up
To the surface
find your own purposes
When you think you
think you had enough
Pleasure and pain
in your life
Hang on
try to look above
You’re in for the
ride of your life
Hang on and
when times get ruff
You will make it
try to hold on
When you think
you had enough
No one will save you
but you baby
You know
that it’s true
When you think
you had enough
When you think
you had enough
Baby Hang On
try to look above
Yeah you’re in for
the ride of your life
Hang on and
when times get ruff
You will make it
try to hold on
You will make it
just carry on
When you think
you had enough
Fragile
like a single
One feather
silently flying
Wailed the wings
are holding you
